name: ANUX
description:
ANUX is a first person puzzle game, solve puzzles using EX gun, as long as the sphere energy is alive, your path is clear! (HEADPHONE IS RECOMMENDED)

===========================

CONTROL
  • WSAD to move
  • LEFT MOUSE to shoot
  • MOUSE WHEEL to set bullet timer

===========================
